title: Gold Options Traders Boost Long-Shot Bets Even After Correction
description: Some staunch gold bulls are shrugging off the precious metal’s historic correction and holding out for another surge to unheard-of levels.
content: Some staunch gold bulls are shrugging off the precious metal’s historic correction and holding out for another surge to unheard-of levels.
